title: Singam Lyrics Singam Song lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Singam
Singer : DSP & Megha

Everybody Listen Listen Listen
Make Way For The King
Everybody Listen Listen Listen
Just Watch The Way He Is Gonna Swing… Alright

Hei Vinnai Theendum Kathiravan
Endha Ellai Thaandum Kaatrivan
Kaattrai Erikum Neruppivan
Kai Pattal Kothikkum Neer Ivan

Everybody Listen He Is On A Mission
You Can Never Stop Him
He Is A Human Tornado
Everybody Listen He Has Got The Right Decision
You Cannot Mess With Him Not Even With His Shadow

Singam Singam He Is Durai Singam
Ivan Nadanthal Pothum Nilamum Vanangum
Hey..! Singam Singam He Is Durai Singam
Ayim Boothangal Yaavum Evanul Adangum

Hey! Roudigalin Raajiyangal Ranagalamai Irukkum… Irukkum
Kavalthurai Thaernthaetuthu Singathaithan Anuppum… Jeyikkum
Veeram… Athu Ithuthano
Soorum… Iru Vizhithano
Theeram… Aathu Evanthano
Mayavano…
Paarkam… Athu Padithano
Kaakum.. Iru Kaithano
Neekam.. Thani Vazhithano
Niranthara Bayam Ivano…(mg.com)
Singam Singam He Is Durai Singam .....

He can hunt you and make you even shiver
You can try to get him you wont you lose you cant
He is a leading power ....

Oh Oho Oho
Vagai Vagaiyayai Thavaru Seiyum Kayavargalai Arivaan Arivaan
Miga Migayai Kalavarama Pugai Enavey Nuzhaivaan Suduvaan
Sutham Iru Kaithano…
Ratham Oru Maithano…
Yutham Athu Meithano…(mg.com)
Porkalamo
Sutrum Puvi Evanthano..
Thattum Kadal Alaithano..
Mutrum Pagai Azhippano..
Maanidan Avan Evanno
Singam Singam He Is Durai Singam ....
